name: Stardust (itch) (Wanderer Studio)
description: In a previous life, you were once a member of the mysterious Sand Ninja, an elite society of warriors trained in the mystic arts of controlling the forces of the desert. But those days are long behind you. You've chosen a quiet and easy retirement, content to sit in the shadows of the desert and live a normal life. That is, until one day, an evil force begins to manifest, and you must re-assume the mantle of the Ninja, collect the strange stardust particles left behind by the shadowy invaders, and fight to save your home from certain destruction.
